summary: Mobile-first interactive fast food ordering app for “Munchies O’Clock” enabling customers to browse a category-based menu, view item details, manage a cart, and place orders via a simple non-payment checkout flow, with a modern UI optimized for quick ordering, plus email sign-up and admin capabilities for order management and menu editing.

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity (passkeys) authentication for the app, and enforce role-based access (Customer vs Admin) throughout the UI and backend.

Create the customer-facing menu browsing experience with category-based navigation for: Fries, Bhajia, Meats & Mains, Drinks, and Sides & Sauces; and include all provided items under their categories.
Provide item cards and an item detail view showing name, image, description, and price (using placeholders for now), and make it easy to replace placeholder pricing/descriptions/assets later.
Implement cart functionality: add items to cart, remove items, adjust quantity, and show an order summary with total cost calculation.
Implement a simple, non-payment checkout flow that creates an order in the backend from the cart contents and shows an order confirmation to the customer.
Implement the admin order management dashboard: admins can view orders and update order status through the lifecycle `Pending → In Progress → Completed → Cancelled`.

Implement the admin menu management dashboard: admins can create, edit, and delete categories and items, including item fields (name, description, price, category assignment) and an availability toggle.

Create a coherent visual theme for a modern, mobile-first fast food ordering experience using a warm, appetizing color palette, bold food imagery, clear CTAs, and easy navigation (bottom nav or side menu), applied consistently across customer and admin sections.
Add generated static image assets (logo + generic food placeholder) to the frontend and use them in the UI where item/category images are missing (without routing images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build category-based menu browsing for Fries, Bhajia, Meats & Mains, Drinks, and Sides & Sauces with the provided items
Create item cards/detail views showing name, image, description, and price
Implement cart management (add to cart, remove from cart)
Add order summary with total cost calculation
Implement a simple checkout flow to place orders
Deliver responsive mobile-first UI with clean modern design, warm appetizing palette, bold food images, easy navigation, and clear CTAs
Add email-based sign-up/sign-in (authentication) for customer and admin accounts
Add admin support for order management (view/manage incoming orders)
Add admin menu editing (create/update/remove menu items and categories)
Implement authentication using Internet Identity (passkeys) for customer and admin access, structured so email-based auth can be added later if enabled
Make the first authenticated principal to use the app become the Admin automatically, and persist this admin assignment so it remains stable across reloads/upgrades.

architecturalNotes: Plan for role-based access control (admin vs customer) to gate admin order management and menu editing features.
Use Internet Identity (passkeys) for authentication initially; design auth abstraction to allow adding email-based sign-up/sign-in later if/when the platform enables email.
Admin access control: the first registered/authenticated user (via Internet Identity) will be assigned the admin role for v1.
Order lifecycle for admin management: Pending → In Progress → Completed → Cancelled.
Use placeholder prices/descriptions/images initially; app should support swapping in real pricing/assets later without reworking core flows.
Checkout is non-payment; placing an order should persist the order in the backend for later admin management (no payments unless explicitly added later).
knownIssues: Email-based sign-up/sign-in cannot be implemented currently due to platform/account email capability being disabled; use Internet Identity (passkeys) instead until email is enabled.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wordmark logo reading “Munchies O’Clock” in a bold, modern fast-food style (munchies-logo.dim_1024x256.png)
- Generic appetizing fast-food placeholder photo/illustration with warm tones (menu-item-placeholder.dim_1024x768.png)

generatedImages.description: Wordmark logo reading “Munchies O’Clock” in a bold, modern fast-food style
Generic appetizing fast-food placeholder photo/illustration with warm tones
